title: That new Wraith Caitlyn skin...
body: Is it just me, or would the skin be just slightly better with a voice filter making her sound... more wraith/evil... ...having her sound normal but that recall animation makes me feel disjointed from the skin theme... I don't have a PBE account so I can't put that up for a feedback but... just complaining on my own. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I just cant wait for it to come out!
